full_text:
Page 501
To: [redacted]
Cc: [redacted]
Subject: RE: Epstein update
Sent: Sat, 10 Aug 2019 19:56:09 +0000

Hi [redacted],

I'm checking in to see if you're able to provide us with additional information. I'm 646-618-[redacted] when you have a moment.

Thanks,
[redacted]

From: [redacted] @bop.gov
Sent: Saturday, August 10, 2019 11:42 AM
To: [redacted]
Cc: [redacted]; [redacted] (USMS)
Subject: Re: Epstein update

Hi [redacted],

MCC Administrators have been in touch with [redacted] the USMS since early this morning. I too have been in touch with [redacted] since a little after 9 am, at which time I shared the limited information I had. The press release is the sum total of the information we have at this time pending the investigation. I am going into the secure perimeter to see if there is information to share, but please be advised that some of what I get may be shared with your office but not further since it is an open investigation.

Thank you,
[redacted]
Supervisory Staff Attorney
CLC New York
Metropolitan Correctional Center
150 Park Row
New York, New York 10007
p: (646)836-[redacted]
f: (646)836-7665

>>> [redacted] (USANYS) [redacted] @usdoj.gov 8/10/2019 11:30 AM >>>

It is frankly unbelievable to me that BOP is issuing public press releases on this before telling us basic information so that we can relay it to his attorneys who can relay it to his family. When can we expect to get either some sort of statement we can pass along to counsel as accurate and reliable or have a call with someone?

I understand from the Marshals that they have been unsuccessful in reaching anyone with authority at BOP, and given the BOP press release that was just put out I assume we need to speak with someone there. Please advise.

Thank you.
[redacted]
On Aug 10, 2019, at 10:43 [redacted] (USANYS) [redacted] usa.doj.gov> wrote:

As you might imagine, we are getting increasingly frantic calls from defense counsel who continue to be seeing information in the press that we—the U.S. Attorney's Office—haven't yet received. We need to know as soon as
